                                 Release Notes
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In order to trap him, he must become him.

ORIGINAL TITLE: Face/off
COUNTRY: USA
DIRECTOR: John Woo
SCREENWRITER: Mike Webb & Michael Colleary
COMPOSER: John Powell
CINEMATOGRAPHER: Oliver Wood
CAST: John Travolta, Nicolas Cage, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon & Alessandro  Nivola
STUDIO/PRODUCER: Paramount Pictures

FBI agent Sean Archer (John Travolta) knows how to stop elusive terrorist Castor 
Troy (Nicolas Cage). He&#039;ll become him. Archer undergoes a futuristic surgery and 
has Troy&#039;s face mapped  onto his, then  infiltrates  the  terrorist&#039;s  world  to 
discover his  deadly secrets. But as much as Archer looks and acts like Troy, he 
doesn&#039;t really  know him. He never figures Troy will retaliate and force doctors 
to  transform him  into Archer. Now the  agent faces a shattering nightmare: his
archrival is living with his family.

The Travolta/Cage star-power comes on strong and so does the excitement in  this
roaring thrill machine of a movie directed by John Woo (Broken Arrow). So buckle
up. It&#039;s going to be a furious fight.
